name: Temple of Prophecy
description:
Hera has studied under the Oracle of Fire, Vanhi, for years, but one day two assassins do him in. In a world where murder is impossible Hera must search out a resurrection for her mentor, and who else could preform such an exploit then the Prophetess who came from heaven.

Climb the Temple of Prophecy in search of the Prophetess. Solve the puzzles that block your way and defeat the enemies that oppose you. If you die then craft items and enchant your equipment to help you with your battles. No game overs, just work your way higher and higher until you reach the very heavens.
